title: Cherry tomato pasta salad
ingredients: ['300g pasta shells', '3 cloves garlic', '7 tablespoons olive oil', '4 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '3 tablespoons freshly chopped basil', '2 tablespoons freshly chopped chives', 'Salt and pepper to taste', '500g cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 small jar black olives, pitted and halved']
